named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPoint t where t.externalCode=:externalCode

named-query.name: LastLoadInfo.findByExternalCodeAndParamCode
named-query.query: select t from LastLoadInfo t where t.externalCode=:externalCode and t.paramCode=:paramCode

named-query.name: HourMeteringDataRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from HourMeteringDataRaw t where t.externalCode=:externalCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.hour=:hour and t.dataSource=:dataSource and t.wayEntering=:wayEntering and t.status=:status and t.unitCode=:unitCode and t.paramCode=:paramCode

named-query.name: DayMeteringBalanceRaw.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from DayMeteringBalanceRaw t where t.externalCode=:externalCode

named-query.name: DayMeteringBalanceRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select t from DayMeteringBalanceRaw t where t.externalCode=:externalCode and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.dataSource=:dataSource and t.wayEntering=:wayEntering and t.status=:status and t.unitCode=:unitCode and t.paramCode=:paramCode

named-query.name: DayMeteringBalanceRaw.findReadyData
named-query.query: select t from DayMeteringBalanceRaw t where t.meteringPoint.id=:meteringPointId and t.meteringDate=:meteringDate and t.status=:status and t.paramCode=:paramCode

named-query.name: Group.findAll
named-query.query: select t from Group t order by t.id

named-query.name: DayMeteringDataOper.findByDate
named-query.query: select t from DayMeteringDataOper t where t.operDate=:operDate

named-query.name: DocType.findAll
named-query.query: select t from DocType t order by t.id

named-query.name: DocTemplate.findAll
named-query.query: select t from DocTemplate t order by t.id

named-query.name: DocMeteringReadingHeader.findAll
named-query.query: select t from DocMeteringReadingHeader t order by t.id

named-query.name: DocMeteringReadingLine.findByHeader
named-query.query: select t from DocMeteringReadingLine t where t.header.id=:headerId order by t.id
